# Quick start

```{r}
available_templates()
```

```{r}
print_template("basic_template")
```

```{r, eval = FALSE}
root_path = "..."
make_prj_tree(json_str = "basic_template", path = root_path)

my_template <- ".../sample_template.json"
make_prj_tree(file = my_template, path = root_path)
```
